alert.note: Alert for Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Jackson; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Red River; Webster (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 31 at 9:57PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Webster, northwestern Jackson, central De Soto, northern Red River, north central Natchitoches, southeastern Caddo, south central Claiborne, Bienville, southeastern Bossier and Lincoln Parishes through 1045 PM CDT... At 956 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from Heflin to 13 miles west of Ringgold to 8 miles south of Stonewall. Movement was east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Ruston, Minden, Grambling, Arcadia, Ringgold, Sibley, Gibsland, Dubberly, Heflin, Dubach, Simsboro, Martin, Vienna, Hall Summit, Saline, Lucky, Ashland, Castor, Grand Cane and Bienville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Louisiana.

area.areaDesc: Bienville; Bossier; Caddo; Claiborne; De Soto; Jackson; Lincoln; Natchitoches; Red River; Webster
